name: BDocNotice
desc: Notice component for BOA markdown documents.
sample: <BDocNotice type='tip' header='Tip Message' content='This is a tip message' />

infoArray.name: type
infoArray.desc: Determines type of the notice. One of: ['tip', 'warning', 'error']

infoArray.name: fitMode
infoArray.desc: Determines the paddings in interior design. Default false, wide paddings like material.
